content: hello below are some notes and the pattern for the esquie plushie this pattern is recommended for beginners looking to learn more stitches or advanced beginners disclaimer this pattern is free please do not resell this pattern because that would be super lame and very greedy and lazy a credit to stitchress charen is always appreciated for completed projects shared online or given away/sold thanks 😊 equipment needed 4 0 mm body arm legs shoes face crown spike large and small 3 0 mm arm detailing face detailing tapestry needle yarn needed 1 skein 100g dark red legs body arms 1 skein 100g white face 1 skein 50g bright yellow arm detailing banner 1 skein 50g black face detailing 1 skein 100g gold yellow crown spike large and small 1 skein 50g bright red banner 1 skein 100g tan shoes if you re looking for yarn suggestions i used lion brand 24/7 cotton yarn for the legs body arms crown spike large and small and face https //www lionbrand com/products/24-7- cotton and i used hobbii rainbow cotton 8/4 for the face detailing arms detailing and banner https //hobbii com/rainbow-cotton-8-4 abbreviations blo = back loop only chain = chain decrease = decrease single_crochet mc = magic_ring single_crochet = single_crochet single_crochet increase = single_crochet increase legs make 2 round 1 take dark red yarn mc single_crochet 6 in mc 6 sts round 2 single_crochet increase 6 12 sts round 3 single_crochet increase 1 single_crochet 1 x6 18 sts round 4 single_crochet 1 single_crochet increase 1 single_crochet 2 x5 single_crochet increase 2 25 sts round 5-7 single_crochet 25 25 sts fasten ob for the first leg for the second leg keep the loop on your hook move onto the body body * *as you re working on the body fill the plushie with stubing along the way it ll be a little tricky to stub towards the end to get the filling down towards the legs round 1 with the dark red yarn loop still on your hook with the second leg ch1 insert your book into a stitch on the first leg single_crochet all around the first leg into the chain and then single_crochet all around the second leg end the round by single_crochet into the chain again 52 sts round 2 single_crochet increase 1 single_crochet 18 single_crochet increase 1 single_crochet 5 x3 single_crochet 10 single_crochet increase 1 single_crochet 4 57 sts round 3-4 single_crochet all around 57 sts round 5 single_crochet increase 1 single_crochet 18 x3 60 sts round 6 single_crochet all around 60 sts round 7 single_crochet increase 1 single_crochet 9 x6 66 sts round 8-12 single_crochet all around 66 sts round 13 decrease 1 single_crochet 3 x3 single_crochet 36 decrease 1 single_crochet 3 62 sts round 14 single_crochet all around 62 sts round 15 single_crochet 4 decrease 1 x2 single_crochet 38 single_crochet 4 decrease 1 x2 58 sts round 16 single_crochet 5 decrease 1 x2 single_crochet 30 single_crochet 5 decrease 1 x2 54 sts round 17-18 single_crochet all around
